title: din like gothic?
content:
hello. can anybody help me with this font, should be quite straight forward, just can’t seem to find it, many thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [-1a.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808135349/http:/typophile.com/files/-1a.jpg) | 166.11 KB |

 [‹ Legend of Hell House](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808135349/http:/typophile.com/node/20700 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID TATTOO FONT, HELP!! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808135349/http:/typophile.com/node/20711 "Go to next forum topic")
author: edward maddison

comments.content: It’s [Akkurat Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808135349/http:/www.lineto.com/The+Fonts/Categories/Text+Fonts/Akkurat/Fett/). Or rather, Akkurat Fett. No relation to Boba Fett :-)
many thanks! i would have never have found it
